# Leverage Lab Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Production-ready Next.js 13 marketing website for Leverage Lab consulting business.

## Stack
- Next.js 13 (Pages Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Hook Form
- SendGrid API
- Vercel Deployment

## Key Features
- Marketing pages (home, services, contact)
- Contact form with SendGrid integration
- Calendly integration
- SEO optimized with meta tags and JSON-LD
- Google Analytics 4 integration
- Responsive mobile-first design

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Follow Tailwind utility-first approach
- Maintain accessibility standards (semantic HTML, ARIA labels)
- Use environment variables for sensitive data
- Follow brand colors: #18A8A8, #36D6C8, #7B61FF

## Project Status
✅ All components and pages created
✅ Configuration files set up
✅ Dependencies installed
✅ Project builds successfully
✅ Ready for environment variable setup and deployment

## Next Steps
1. Copy `.env.example` to `.env.local` and fill in actual values
2. Run `npm run dev` to start development server
3. Deploy to Vercel and configure environment variables
4. Update placeholder values in `_document.tsx`
5. Replace placeholder logos and add favicon and OG image
